properties.areaDesc: Waters from Florence to Cape Blanco OR from 10 to 60 nm; Coastal waters from Florence to Cape Blanco OR out 10 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 24 at 3:31AM PST until January 25 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Steep 10 to 15 foot combined seas, highest this afternoon
and evening as 18 second period swell builds from the west-
northwest and peaks. Southerly winds 10 to 20 knots today will
increase to 20 to 30 knots late tonight into early Saturday
morning.

* WHERE...All areas.

* WHEN...Until 4 PM PST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Steep seas will make conditions difficult to hazardous
for small craft. Building long period swell today will result in
increasingly more breaking waves at bar crossings. Use extra
caution crossing bars today as long period swell continues to
build. Increasing winds tonight into Saturday will steepen seas
further.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
A Small Craft Advisory means that winds and seas will create a
potential hazard to smaller vessels and inexperienced mariners.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST SATURDAY
